8/10. Its a good game where you get to deal with hackers, who can shoot you through a wall, and also get killed by russians that keeps on flexing their hundred dollar knife, all that in your first three matches.but overall good game

If your reading this to decide if ya should play...don't.  This game has been out for 20 years+  the learning curve is real steep... very unforgiving in competitive play.  But once your aim, movement, map knowledge is good...there is nothing else like it.  The best strategy fps out there by far, not going anywhere anytime soon.
I LOVE THIS GAME TO BITS BUT I KEEP GETTING A COOL DOWN BECAUSE OF AFK WTF ?
I mean now that this game is free there's REALLY no reason not to try it. Runs well on ALL pcs - 2013 macbooks included. Just might wanna use a mouse :)

I absolutely suck ass at this game, yet I still love to play it with my buddies. Every time I play CSGO I laugh my ass off and smash my desk and keyboard. Its my least favorite game, but every time my friends are playing I join them. I give this game 5 stars and -3.5 stars at the same time.

This game has a love/hate relationship. It's up to you if you have a bad game or good game. If you truly work hard at becoming good at this game, and try to learn everything you can, you will love it. You just have to have the right attitude.

Игра говно, несколько лет в неё в бухал и вак получил не за что а сейчас осознаю что все деньги и вся кая хуйня БЫЛО В ТЮХОНО В КС я помню момент когда я её начел играть и когда мне дали вак я понел что это не игра а говно какое то. Пацаны в чём смысл стрелятся и так каждый день, поимите вы играете и не получяите не чего такого тратите деньги на скины а в замен что получяите

I like this straight forward shooting game, void of faulty political, and world views that are wrapped up in some creepy story line where good can be evil, and evil good, like in so many games. This is the best fast paced, totally responsive and detailed shooting game out there. I love the "Deathmatch" game.
